globalProperty.value: select distinct pi.identifier as ID, concat("",p.uuid) as uuid, concat(pn.given_name," ", ifnull(pn.family_name,'')) as 'PROGRAM_MODULE_LABEL_NAME_KEY', getPatientARTNumber(pat.patient_id) as 'PROGRAM_MODULE_LABEL_ART_NUMBER_KEY', getPatientAge(pat.patient_id) as 'PROGRAM_MODULE_LABEL_AGE_KEY', getPatientVillage(pat.patient_id) as 'PROGRAM_MODULE_LABEL_VILLAGE_KEY', getPatientPhoneNumber(pat.patient_id) as 'PROGRAM_MODULE_LABEL_PHONE_NUMBER_KEY', getPatientEmergencyContact(pat.patient_id) as 'PROGRAM_MODULE_LABEL_EMERGENCY_CONTACT_KEY', getViralLoadTestDate(pat.patient_id) as 'PROGRAM_MODULE_LABEL_DATE_LAST_VL_KEY', getViralLoadTestResult(pat.patient_id) as 'PROGRAM_MODULE_LABEL_RESULT_LAST_VL_KEY' from patient pat join person_name pn on pat.patient_id = pn.person_id and pn.voided = 0 and pat.voided=0 join patient_identifier pi on pat.patient_id = pi.patient_id and pi.voided=0 join patient_identifier_type pit on pi.identifier_type = pit.patient_identifier_type_id join global_property gp on gp.property="bahmni.primaryIdentifierType" and gp.property_value=pit.uuid join person p on p.person_id = pat.patient_id and p.voided=0 where patientHasEnrolledIntoHivProgram(pat.patient_id) = "Yes" AND patientIsOnARVTreatment(pat.patient_id) AND patientIsNotDead(pat.patient_id) AND patientIsNotLostToFollowUp(pat.patient_id) AND patientIsNotTransferredOut(pat.patient_id) AND ( (getViralLoadTestDate(pat.patient_id) IS NOT NULL AND timestampdiff(MONTH, getViralLoadTestDate(pat.patient_id), NOW()) >= 6 ) OR ( getPatientARVStartDate(pat.patient_id) IS NOT NULL AND timestampdiff(MONTH, getPatientARVStartDate(pat.patient_id), NOW()) >= 6 AND (getViralLoadTestDate(pat.patient_id) IS NULL OR timestampdiff(MONTH, getViralLoadTestDate(pat.patient_id), NOW()) >= 6) ) OR (patientHasEnrolledInVlEacProgram(pat.patient_id) AND timestampdiff(MONTH, getViralLoadTestDate(pat.patient_id), NOW()) >= 3) OR ( getViralLoadTestResult(pat.patient_id) IS NOT NULL AND getViralLoadTestResult(pat.patient_id) < 1000 AND getViralLoadTestDate(pat.patient_id) IS NOT NULL AND timestampdiff(MONTH, getViralLoadTestDate(pat.patient_id), NOW()) >= 12 AND patientOnTreatmentForOneYear(pat.patient_id) ) ) order by pat.patient_id desc;
